segments.text: Hello . I'm answering the ad in the paper about your car.And I wonder if it is still available ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good.Can you give me some information about it ... uh .. mileage and the tires and things like that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it has got low mileage.The tires are in perfect condition and it's in excellent shape .
segments.speaker: S2
